instruction: Produce a speech based on the given text
input: The world of technology is constantly changing.
output: Good evening, everyone. Technology has become an indispensable part of our lives and it is evident that it is rapidly evolving and adapting to our ever-changing needs. We must stay up-to-date and informed in order to remain competitive. Therefore, it is essential that we are aware of the world of technology and its constant changes. Thank you.
